page.title: 13Aston Memories
page.content: Mrs.M.has been living in Aston for 50 yrs.There were not so many houses in those days,you could walk for miles without ever coming across a house. Everyone knew each others business, most housewives were at home all day but not now.When the old school was declared unsafe, the villagers raised money for the new building.Mrs.M. became school cook by accident.The headmaster found the new cook in tears and asked Mrs.M.to help.She said she didn't know what to do either,and her husband said "Only temporary".She rem- ained for 25 yrs.Another time she res- cued a plucked chicken left for dead in the road.She took it home on her bike,knitted it a jacket,fed it on brandy and oats and it lived to a ripe old age!At Christmas,a tractor pulling a trailer of carol singers tour Aston. {By A.Thomas,N.Monvoisin & J.Perry.
